TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It gets overthrown in the Great Kerbal Workers Revolution.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, will win cases when I ask him to, and get me money back while making me look good.

Granted, hes deaf and cant listen to you

i wish i had a buran + energia booster

Granted, but it has no fuel.

I wish for an awesome animation

Edited October 6, 2015 by ibuckshot5

granted, but it never stops. Ever. It keeps going and going and going and going and going and going and going and going and going

I wish I was a fly on a wall

Granted, but you get squashed...

I wish a thing would happen.

And, that thing is a vampire invasion.

I wish for cats.

Granted, but they are zombie cats that bite you. You get infected.

I wish for a pegasus.

Granted. He kicks you.

Granted, hes deaf and cant listen to you

Actually, I speak Sign Language IRL, no joke. So try again.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, will win cases when I ask him to, and get me money back while making me look good.

All illegal activity disappears, for reasons, and so all courts of law are abolished.

I wish for KER to be stockified.

All illegal activity disappears, for reasons, and so all courts of law are abolished.

I wish for KER to be stockified.

Granted, but they are out of stock, so you have to wait.

You didn't grant me my wish, though!

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, will win cases when I ask him to, and get me money back while making me look good.

Granted, but they are out of stock, so you have to wait.

You didn't grant me my wish, though!

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, will win cases when I ask him to, and get me money back while making me look good.

Fine, Granted. Too bad all illegal activity disappears, for reasons, and so all courts of law are abolished.

I wish for all mods to be integrated into stock KSP.

Granted. KSP is taken over by EA, and the mods become DLC.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, and get me money back while making me look good.

Granted. The Government bids you money to get rid of him because you use him so much. You accept, and now both the general population as well as that lawyer all hate you.

I wish for no school or work after elementary, other than collage. (No middle school, no high school, no job.)

Granted, you fail your education miserably and never pass collage.

I wish to WishCeption Dman into believing that lawyers don't exist.

Granted, but law collapses and you get shot by looters.

I wish I had friends.

Granted, but law collapses and you get shot by looters.

I wish I had friends.

Granted. Their gerbils because you can't afford anything better.

I wish to have my cat back

- - - Updated - - -

Nvm what i just said. This. Was my kitty I'm talking about!

Granted. The cat is still partially dead.

I wish Betelgeuse would explode.

Granted. Your DVD player blows up.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, gets me money back, makes me look good, and will remain my lawyer in perpetuity.

Granted. He hates you personally and tries to evade you however possible, thus not allowing you to use his service.

I wish for a positive iron molecule.

Granted. You get ONE positive Iron molecule. It reacts with Oxegen, and gives you Fe2O

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, likes me, will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, gets me money back, makes me look good, and will remain my lawyer in perpetuity.

Granted. He hates you for constant lawyer posts.

I wish Dman would stop it with the lawyer stuff.

Granted but you explode so you no longer need a lawyer.

I wish I could buy as much not bitter chocolate as I want for free.

Granted. All the chocolate companies go out of business because they are not making a profit.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, likes me (and will continue to), will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, gets me money back, makes me look good, and will remain my lawyer in perpetuity.

Granted. Darth Vader destroys him in sheer frustration that you keep making lawyer posts. Seriously, stop.

I wish Dman would stop with the lawyer posts.

Granted but he (probably) will keep making lawyer posts.

I wish for a computer with a petabyte of RAM.
